Miscellaneous Utilities.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedHttpServletResponse
    A wrapper around a HttpServletResponse which buffers all output being written to BufferedHttpServletResponse.getOutputStream() or BufferedHttpServletResponse.getWriter().
    BufferedServletOutput
    Helper class to be used in ServletResponse wrappers.
    BufferedServletResponse
    A wrapper around a ServletResponse which buffers all output being written to BufferedServletResponse.getOutputStream() or BufferedServletResponse.getWriter().
    BufferedSlingHttpServletResponse
    A wrapper around a SlingHttpServletResponse which buffers all output being written to BufferedSlingHttpServletResponse.getOutputStream() or BufferedSlingHttpServletResponse.getWriter().
    BufferingResponse Deprecated
    Rather use BufferedHttpServletResponse
    CookieUtil  
    DynamicObjectInputStream  
    InfoWriter
    Utility class to help create normalized logging messages especially to display configuration info in OSGi Components' activate methods.
    ModeUtil  
    OverridePathSlingRequestWrapper
    Request wrapper to get the Resource and SlingBindings objects for a request scoped to a specified path.
    ParameterUtil  
    PathInfoUtil
    Util class to help with parsing URIs and PathInfos.
    ResourceDataUtil  
    ResourceServiceManager
    Base class for services to extend which want to manage other services based on repository configurations.
    ResourceUtil
    Utils for JCR resources.
    RunnableOnMaster
    Abstact base class for scheduled job to be run only on the cluster master.
    ServletOutputStreamWrapper
    A ServletOutputStream based on a simple OutputStream.
    StringWriterResponse Deprecated
    Rather use BufferedSlingHttpServletResponse instead
    TemplateUtil
    Utility functions for working with CQ Templates.
    TextUtil  
    ThreadContextClassLoaderTaskExecutor
    Utility class for executing a particular task with a set Thread Context Class Loader.
    TypeUtil  
    WorkflowHelper.AssetResourceResolverPair
    A simple tuple which contains a resolved asset and a resource resolver, so that the resource resolver can later be closed.
